title: Prosciutto wrapped figs and dates
ingredients: ['12 fresh figs', '15g cream cheese, at room temperature', '150g goat cheese, at room temperature', '10 leaves fresh basil, finely chopped', '12 dates', 'prosciutto - you will need about 2.5cm x 8cm per fig or date', 'olive oil, for brushing', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '235ml balsamic vinegar', '25ml maple syrup']
